0111111100100000 0101100110101100 1 -> sum: 1101100011001101, cout: 0
0111010100011001 0011011100110000 1 -> sum: 1010110001001010, cout: 0
1000010000011110 0000100010100011 0 -> sum: 1000110011000001, cout: 0
0110110101111001 0011000101011100 0 -> sum: 1001111011010101, cout: 0
0101111101100010 1000011000010001 0 -> sum: 1110010101110011, cout: 0
1111011100101011 0110110110111110 0 -> sum: 0110010011101001, cout: 1

1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
